title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile-Based Online Mathematics Competency Strengthening Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Identify individual math learning patterns through learning analytics and enable over 80% of learners to create personalized study plans
Achieve over 90% completion rate for weekly mobile microlearning modules (3 sessions per week)
Apply mathematical problem-solving processes with over 70% accuracy in the final project

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
